title: Product Development Coordinator
job_overview:
About Us:
We are a fast-growing premium plush toy brand that designs unique, high-quality products with a playful and elegant twist. To keep up with our rapid development cycles, we’re looking for a proactive and detail-oriented Sourcing & Sample Production Coordinator to help us accelerate our sample-making process and streamline supplier communication.

Your Responsibilities

As our Sourcing & Sample Production Coordinator, you will play a key role in bringing our plush toy designs to life by working closely with manufacturers and suppliers.

Research, evaluate, and contact potential production partners (primarily overseas)

Send out technical drawings, 3D models, and specification sheets to suppliers

Request and manage quotes for sample production

Follow up on timelines, approvals, and logistics

Coordinate the delivery of samples and track their status

Maintain clear documentation and communication between design, sourcing, and logistics teams

Assist in negotiating prices, production timelines, and terms when needed

Your Profile
We’re looking for someone who is both technically competent and highly organized.

Previous experience in sourcing, purchasing, or coordinating sample production (especially for consumer goods, textiles, or toys)

Basic understanding of CAD files, technical drawings, and 3D models (you won’t design, but must be comfortable handling and sharing them)

Fluent in English (written & spoken); Mandarin or other relevant languages are a plus

Strong communication and follow-up skills

Highly detail-oriented with excellent time management

Experience working with overseas suppliers (China, Turkey, etc.) is a big advantage

What We Offer
A flexible, remote-first position with creative freedom

The opportunity to work with a young, design-driven brand

Room to grow into a long-term position as the brand expands

Insight into the entire product development process—from concept to final product
